price: ߛߊ߲ ( ߝߣߊ߫ ) ߝߙߊߝߙߊߕߐ߫ ߊ߬ ߘߐ߫ ߟߋ߬ ߸ ߊߟߊ߫ ߘߏ߲߬ ߠߊ߫ ߦߟߌߡߊߘߌߦߊ ߦߋ߫ ߞߍߕߊ ߟߋ߬ ߘߌ߫
arabic: ٱلسَّمَآءُ مُنفَطِرُۢ بِهِۦۚ كَانَ وَعۡدُهُۥ مَفۡعُولًا

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: al-samāu munfaṭirun bihi kāna waʿduhu mafʿūlan
